trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Get-Event
trans-unit.target: Get-Event

trans-unit.source: Get-Event
trans-unit.target: Get-Event

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Gets the events in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件佇列中的事件。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: BySource (Default)
trans-unit.target: BySource （預設值）

trans-unit.source: ById
trans-unit.target: ById

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Event** cmdlet gets events in the Windows PowerShell event queue for the current session.
trans-unit.target: **Get-event** 指令程式取得 Windows PowerShell 事件佇列中的目前工作階段事件。

trans-unit.source: You can get all events or use the *EventIdentifier* or *SourceIdentifier* parameter to specify the events.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得所有事件，或使用 *EventIdentifier* 或 *SourceIdentifier* 參數來指定的事件。

trans-unit.source: When an event occurs, it is added to the event queue.
trans-unit.target: 發生事件時，它會新增到事件佇列。

trans-unit.source: The event queue includes events for which you have registered, events created by using the New-Event cmdlet, and the event that is raised when Windows PowerShell exits.
trans-unit.target: 事件佇列包含您已經註冊的事件、使用 New-Event Cmdlet 建立的事件，以及當 Windows PowerShell 結束時所引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use **Get-Event** or Wait-Event to get the events.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **Get-event** 或 Wait-event 來取得的事件。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not get events from the Event Viewer logs.
trans-unit.target: 這個 Cmdlet 不會從事件檢視器記錄檔取得事件。

trans-unit.source: To get those events, use Get-WinEvent or Get-EventLog.
trans-unit.target: 如果要取得這些事件，請使用 Get-WinEvent 或 Get-EventLog。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Get all events
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 取得所有事件

trans-unit.source: This command gets all events in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得事件佇列中所有的事件。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Get events by source identifier
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 取得事件來源識別碼

trans-unit.source: This command gets events in which the value of the SourceIdentifier property is PowerShell.ProcessCreated.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得 SourceIdentifier 屬性的值是 PowerShell.ProcessCreated 的事件。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Get an event based on the time it was generated
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 取得產生的時間為基礎的事件

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to get events by using properties other than SourceIdentifier.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用 SourceIdentifier 以外的屬性來取得事件。

trans-unit.source: The first command gets all events in the event queue and saves them in the $Events variable.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令取得事件佇列中的所有事件，並將它們儲存在 $Events 變數。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses array notation to get the first (0-index) event in the array in the $Events variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令使用陣列標記法來取得在 $Events 變數陣列中的第一個 (0-index) 事件。

trans-unit.source: The command uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the event to the Format-List command, which displays all properties of the event in a list.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用管線運算子 (|) 將事件傳送至 Format-List 命令，此命令會在清單中顯示事件的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to examine the properties of the event object.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您檢視事件物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The third command shows how to use the Where-Object cmdlet to get an event based on the time that it was generated.
trans-unit.target: 第三個命令會顯示如何使用 Where-object 指令程式來取得它所產生的時間為基礎的事件。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Get an event by its identifier
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 取得依其識別項的事件

trans-unit.source: This command gets the event with an event identifier of 2.
trans-unit.target: 此命令取得事件識別碼為 2 的事件。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -EventIdentifier
trans-unit.target: -EventIdentifier

trans-unit.source: Specifies the event identifiers for which this cmdlet gets events.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 會取得事件的事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: -SourceIdentifier
trans-unit.target: -SourceIdentifier

trans-unit.source: Specifies source identifiers for which this cmdlet gets events.
trans-unit.target: 指定來源識別碼，此 cmdlet 會取得事件。

trans-unit.source: The default is all events in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: 預設為事件佇列中的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 不允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用管線傳送輸入至此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSEventArgs
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSEventArgs

trans-unit.source: **Get-Event** returns a **PSEventArgs** object for each event.
trans-unit.target: **取得事件** 傳回 **PSEventArgs** 每個事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: To see a description of this object, type `Get-Help Get-Event -Full` and see the Notes section of the help topic.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看此物件的描述，請輸入 `Get-Help Get-Event -Full` ，請參閱注意一節的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: Events, event subscriptions, and the event queue exist only in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 事件、事件訂閱與事件佇列僅存在目前工作階段中。

trans-unit.source: If you close the current session, the event queue is discarded and the event subscription is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 若關閉目前工作階段，便會捨棄事件佇列，並取消事件訂閱。

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Event** cmdlet returns a **PSEventArgs** object (System.Management.Automation.PSEventArgs) with the following properties:
trans-unit.target: **Get-event** 指令程式會傳回 **PSEventArgs** 物件 (System.Management.Automation.PSEventArgs) 具有下列屬性︰

trans-unit.source: ComputerName.
trans-unit.target: 電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer on which the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生事件之電腦的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property value is populated only when the event is forwarded from a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 從遠端電腦轉送事件時，才會填入這個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: RunspaceId.
trans-unit.target: RunspaceId。

trans-unit.source: A GUID that uniquely identifies the session in which the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 可唯一識別發生事件之工作階段的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: This property value is populated only when the event is forwarded from a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 從遠端電腦轉送事件時，才會填入這個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: EventIdentifier.
trans-unit.target: EventIdentifier。

trans-unit.source: An integer (Int32) that uniquely identifies the event notification in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 可唯一識別目前工作階段中之事件通知的整數 (Int32)。

trans-unit.source: Sender.
trans-unit.target: 寄件者。

trans-unit.source: The object that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 產生事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: In the value of the *Action* parameter, the $Sender automatic variable contains the sender object.
trans-unit.target: 值的 *動作* 參數，$Sender 自動變數包含寄件者物件。

trans-unit.source: SourceEventArgs.
trans-unit.target: SourceEventArgs。

trans-unit.source: The first parameter that derives from EventArgs, if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 EventArgs 的第一個參數 (如果存在的話)。

trans-unit.source: For example, in a timer elapsed event in which the signature has the form Object sender, Timers.ElapsedEventArgs e, the SourceEventArgs property would contain the Timers.ElapsedEventArgs.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在計時器已經歷事件，表單 Object sender，Timers.ElapsedEventArgs e，已簽章，SourceEventArgs 屬性會包含 Timers.ElapsedEventArgs。

trans-unit.source: In the value of the *Action* parameter, the $EventArgs automatic variable contains this value.
trans-unit.target: 值的 *動作* $EventArgs 自動變數的參數包含此值。

trans-unit.source: SourceArgs.
trans-unit.target: SourceArgs。

trans-unit.source: All parameters of the original event signature.
trans-unit.target: 原始事件簽章的所有參數。

trans-unit.source: For a standard event signature, $Args\[0\] represents the sender, and $Args\[1\] represents the SourceEventArgs.
trans-unit.target: 標準事件簽章 $Args\[0\] 代表寄件者，以及 $Args\[1\] 代表 SourceEventArgs。

trans-unit.source: In the value of the *Action* parameter, the $Args automatic variable contains this value.
trans-unit.target: 值的 *動作* $Args 自動變數的參數包含此值。

trans-unit.source: SourceIdentifier.
trans-unit.target: SourceIdentifier。

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the event subscription.
trans-unit.target: 識別事件訂閱的字串。

trans-unit.source: In the value of the *Action* parameter, the SourceIdentifier property of the $Event automatic variable contains this value.
trans-unit.target: 值的 *動作* $Event 自動變數的 SourceIdentifier 屬性的參數包含此值。

trans-unit.source: TimeGenerated.
trans-unit.target: TimeGenerated。

trans-unit.source: A **DateTime** object that represents the time at which the event was generated.
trans-unit.target: A **DateTime** 物件，表示產生該事件的時間。

trans-unit.source: In the value of the *Action* parameter, the TimeGenerated property of the $Event automatic variable contains this value.
trans-unit.target: 值的 *動作* 參數，$Event 自動變數的 TimeGenerated 屬性包含此值。

trans-unit.source: --MessageData.
trans-unit.target: -MessageData。

trans-unit.source: Data associated with the event subscription.
trans-unit.target: 與事件訂閱相關聯的資料。

trans-unit.source: Users specify this data when they register an event.
trans-unit.target: 使用者註冊事件時，會指定此資料。

trans-unit.source: In the value of the *Action* parameter, the MessageData property of the $Event automatic variable contains this value.
trans-unit.target: 值的 *動作* $Event 自動變數的 MessageData 屬性的參數包含此值。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: New-Event

trans-unit.target: Register-engineevent

trans-unit.source: Register-ObjectEvent
trans-unit.target: Register-objectevent

trans-unit.target: Register-wmievent

trans-unit.source: Remove-Event
trans-unit.target: 移除事件

trans-unit.source: Unregister-Event
trans-unit.target: 取消註冊事件

trans-unit.source: Wait-Event
trans-unit.target: 等候事件
